description:
Decades ago, monsters and humans established trade relations. With the influx of human technology and capital, the monster world embarked on a modernization process.

Each monster believed that as long as they worked hard, they could earn a lot of money because opportunities were everywhere. At first, this was indeed the case, and many monsters got rich overnight.

- - Until humans launched a trade war.

Help a humble rabbit spirit expand her online store selling homegrown carrots and radishes during this hard time. Uncover hidden secrets while growing the business and becoming a successful entrepreneur.

+ Full voice acting for all characters.
+ Dozens of cute CGs and funny images.
+ Trade popular items between different worlds.
+ A unique worldview and a humorous but profound story for 20+ hours of gameplay.
name: Bunny e-Shop
